page.title: 06Bramley 1985 -Family life-1
page.content: There are 24 children in our class, (age 9/10).Only 5 children have been to a{Church}this year; 3 to C of E, 1 Methodist and 1 Pentecostalist. 5 fathers are unemployed,whilst 12 Mums work.{Jobs}include 4 miners,3 steelworkers,3 in food,1 TV repairer, 1 engineer,1 bus driver,3 builders, and 1 probation officer. 15 children belong to 2 sibling family 5 " " " 3 " " 4 " " " 4 " " Every house has a TV.7 have cars.19 a phone{Labour saving devices are common 95% have washing machines; 25% have tumble driers; 29% food mixers; 100% vacuum cleaners; 66% electric drills; 8% dishwashers%; 12% have microwaves; 29% have open coal fires; 54% have central heating. {(N.B.-Bramley to become a Smokeless {Zone from Dec 1985);
